sentences: Since 1996, our client designs, develops, and sells products and services for high-performance networks to enable customers to build scalable, reliable, secure, and cost-effective networks for their businesses, while achieving agility and improved operating efficiency through automation

Their high-performance network and service offerings include routing, switching, Wi-Fi, network security, artificial intelligence ("AI") or AI-enabled enterprise networking operations ("AIOps"), and software-defined networking ("SDN") technologies

In addition to our products, they offer their customers a variety of services, including maintenance and support, professional services, Software-as-a-Service ("SaaS"), and education and training programs
5bn in annual revenues, they conduct business in more than 150 countries around the world
The most important facets of life are technology, training, development, and fun
As the Cloud Engineer, you will work in a consultative manner to deliver automation solutions to customers
Work in a consultative manner to deliver Automation solutions to Customers
Follow the Professional Services engagement and delivery processes, working closely with the Project Manager
Working with customers across different zones
Ability to work independently and remotely with limited supervision
Ability to handle multiple tasks, prioritize and meet deadlines
Deep knowledge of IP routing including: BGP, ISIS, MPLS, L3VPN, L2VPN, mVPN
Demonstrable expertise in: Segment Routing (including Traffic Engineering, Flexible Algorithm, PCE)
Understanding of REST API concepts (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE etc
Experience with Kubernetes, and cloud deployment technologies
Experience with container networking on Docker
Parsing data structures in XML, JSON ideally with XPATH or JSONPATH, and YAML
Experience of using Jira or similar tool to create the work breakdown and track the delivery
Robot Framework and familiarity with concepts of BDD
